programmes.show_description: An army sergeant claims her ex-boyfriend's ex-wife destroyed her clothes and military gear when she allegedly doused them with bleach. S16, Ep231
A woman claims her half sister charged her plastic surgery on a joint credit card; she sues for the unpaid balance. S16, Ep232
A landlord is accused of fraudulently evicting a tenant due to a foreclosure; he countersues for a lost 'cash for keys' deal. S16, Ep233
New York cousins fight over a car that was allegedly borrowed and returned damaged. S16, Ep234
A woman disappears on her way to Seattle airport, her fiancé makes an emotional appeal for her safe return. Two weeks later, her body is found in the trunk of her car. S3, Ep1
An Anchorage nurse disappears from her house and only her abandoned car is found. Local police enlist the help of the FBI to solve this baffling case. S3, Ep7
Jimmy Michael, a West Virginia husband and father seemingly dies in an accidental house fire. But, a closer look at the scene reveals a more sinister case. S18, Ep3
When an elderly couple die in a house fire, police suspect their son to be the culprit. Will further investigation reveal the truth? S10, Ep4
Twenty years after a mother of two was found dead, thanks to advanced forensic technology, evidence was revisited and investigators closed in on the killer. S10, Ep5
When the skull of a woman is found in a Texas canyon, investigators discover that she was stabbed. Can they track down the killer? S10, Ep6
Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home. Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
DI Steve Keogh uncovers secrets in Julian Webb's 1994 murder. DCS Kevin Moore, psychiatrist Dr Sohom Das, and reporter Paul Cheston share insights. S1, Ep9
Detectives reveal how they solved the 2013 manslaughter of 8-year-old Ayesha Ali by her mother and her lover. A forensic psychologist explains the twisted relationship between the killers. S1, Ep10
Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home. Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
When Ray Wright suddenly lost contact with his family, they knew something was wrong. Two days later, his brother confronted an intruder in Ray Wright's home. S36, Ep17
The body of a man living under an assumed name is found tied to an anchor. Will his watch and tattoo be enough to identify him? S5, Ep17
The inspection of a woman's skull found in a lake reveals she was brutally butchered. S6, Ep16
Police suspect a depressed heart surgeon took his own life, until they uncover his wife's lust for money and penchant for violence. S5, Ep18
Top notch forensic science helps solve crimes. A gang of experienced criminals stage a series of complicated bank robberies. S6, Ep17
Sophie Lionnet's murder by Kouider and Medouni is discussed by Steve Keogh and Richard Leonard. Experts and Sophie's mother share views. S1, Ep11
Detectives Steve Keogh and Steve Whittaker discuss Aseel Al-Essaie's murder by Cohen, Gordon and Bryan. Fire, CCTV and phone experts share insights. S1, Ep12
Prominent LA therapist Amie Harwick was murdered in February 2020. For the first time, the man who tried to save her opens up about what happened. S36, Ep18
The investigation of a hit and run incident, in which a child was killed, leads to a convincing video reconstruction of the moment of impact. S5, Ep19
When a doctor is accused of assaulting two female patients, his DNA fails to match the crimes. S6, Ep18
When the wife of a farmer goes missing, remarkably, the study of tree ring growth helps investigators to solve the case. S6, Ep20
When a woman is convicted of her husband's murder, her son goes to great lengths to prove her innocence. S6, Ep21
A woman accuses her ailing mother's neighbour of stealing from her mother's home, filing a false restraining order, and stalking. S16, Ep250
A woman is suing her upstairs neighbour for water damage to her home caused by a flood in her apartment; she is countersued for harassment. S16, Ep251
When a bicycle is hit by a car in a parking lot, the alleged wrongdoer blames the cyclist for not picking it up himself. S16, Ep252
A woman takes in a friend, her three children, her grandchild and a dog because they had no place to go; she insists they pay her back for their new beds. S16, Ep253
A woman claims her former friend illegally evicted her and her kids from his home and sues for damages. S16, Ep254
A man accuses his wife's aunt of illegally repossessing his truck; she is countersuing for damage to the truck, unpaid bills and the return of property. S16, Ep255
A woman accuses her ex-roommate of being a 'party animal' and claims she owes for rent, damages to their apartment, and for breaking their lease. S16, Ep256
Punchy reality show about a female judge that has made a real impact on the American justice system. Judge Judy is real, honest and keen to get to the bottom of emotional cases. S8, Ep246

Las Vegas investigative reporter Jeff German was a local legend, but in September 2022, it was the reporter making headlines. S36, Ep19
When a grandmother is found murdered in her hotel room, the killer wounds himself and inadvertently turns himself in. S6, Ep22
This is the story of two brothers who hit the big time on America's porn market, but their rocky relationship ended in disaster. S6, Ep23
The body of a female prison guard is discovered and a signature clue suggests that the killing could be linked to a previous murder. S6, Ep24
Investigators turn to satellite surveillance to track down the abductor of a young girl. When they find her, a hidden fingerprint helps solve the case. S6, Ep25
Custody of a Spider motorcycle, the alleged theft of jewellery and life on a houseboat come into play when ex-lovers call it quits. S16, Ep257
A woman claims her ex-boyfriend from New York owes for an unpaid loan to move into a new apartment. S16, Ep258
A woman says her former friend borrowed money from her to keep from becoming homeless and has yet to pay her back. S16, Ep259
A woman insists that her former friend owes for her services as a singer in her gospel group; her friend countersues for the return of two dresses. S16, Ep260
A Siberian Husky pulls his teen owner on a skateboard then allegedly bites a young man at a skateboard park. S23, Ep1
A woman purchases an 11K car for her fiancé then repossesses it two days later after finding him with another woman. S23, Ep2
The Judge takes a woman's allegations against her boss very seriously; she is shocked to discover the real story. S23, Ep3
